headline: Private-Asset Star Blue Owl Has Been Flying High. Is It Too Close to the Sun?
summary: The private-markets firm, after a stunning rise, has seen its stock tumble this year on concerns over private credit. Goldman and others now call it undervalued.

headline: Bitcoin price tops $110,000 as JPMorgan to allow top cryptocurrencies as collateral

headline: Cooler-than-expected inflation reading keeps Fed on course for a rate cut next week
summary: Data showing that inflation cooled slightly in September is likely to keep the Federal Reserve on course for another quarter-percentage-point interest rate cut next week amid continued concerns about the job market.

headline: Australian Crypto Adoption Outpaces US, Data Shows
summary: Australia’s crypto adoption rate reached 31% in 2025, up from 28% in 2024, putting the nation among the world’s most crypto-engaged populations, as mobile wallet usage indicators show activity more focused on trading and speculation than in other developing countries, according to a16z’s State of Crypto 2025 report. The findings ...

headline: Majority of crypto assets are 'worthless': BlackRock's Mitchnick
summary: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) is regaining some ground after selling off from its record high. BlackRock (BLK) head of digital assets Robbie Mitchnick sits down with Julie Hyman to examine the recent moves in the crypto market. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Favor US Over European Equities, BlackRock's Li Says
summary: BlackRock Global Chief Investment Strategist Wei Li says US earnings strength is starting to broaden out beyond the tech sector. "We favor US equities over likes of European equities," Li tells Bloomberg's Francine Lacqua. "Being selective in European equities like industrials, financials is important," she adds.

headline: Missing This Could Cost You $625,000 in Retirement, Says BlackRock
summary: A recent study by BlackRock and Human Interest reveals an eye-catching gap in retirement savings between workers with access to employer-sponsored retirement plans and those without. The data shows that median-income employees lacking workplace retirement benefits saved one-eighth as much as those with employer-sponsored retirement plans. And by the time they retire, these workers could […] The post BlackRock Says Workers Without This May Lose Out on Almost $625,000 in Retirement Savings appeare
